item.title: CME 在 24 小时交易行动中测试谷歌区块链技术
item.description: 美国芝加哥商品交易所集团正在测试谷歌云（Google Cloud）的区块链技术，以期在全球转向全天候交易的过程中改善市场基础设施。【原文：CME Group Inc. is testing Google Cloud’s blockchain technology as it seeks to improve market infrastructure amid the global shift toward round-the-clock trading.】

item.title: 卡尼称加拿大希望与特朗普 "认真对待 "贸易谈判
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，他的内阁部长们正在与白宫官员接触，希望就贸易问题进行 "严肃 "的谈判，因为美国的贸易伙伴们正在为唐纳德-特朗普总统的下一轮关税大棒做好准备。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said his top cabinet ministers are in contact with White House officials and want to have “serious” negotiations about trade, as US trading partners brace for President Donald Trump’s next barrage of tariffs.】

item.title: DeepSeek 大获成功后，中国向全球提供大量人工智能模型
item.description: DeepSeek 不仅向人工智能行业展示了无需花费数十亿美元就能构建人工智能。它点燃了沉寂已久的中国科技产业；现在，从 OpenAI 公司到 Nvidia 公司等西方公司都可能为此付出代价。【原文：DeepSeek did more than just show the AI industry you don’t have to spend billions to build artificial intelligence. It fired up a long-dormant Chinese tech industry — and now Western names from OpenAI Inc. to Nvidia Corp. may pay the price.】

item.title: 特朗普的加密货币项目计划提供追踪美元的稳定币
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的加密货币项目世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）表示，它计划推出一种可与美元一兑一的稳定币，这是在特朗普政府支持支撑大多数加密货币交易的数字代币之际宣布的。【原文：President Donald Trump’s crypto project World Liberty Financial said it plans to launch a stablecoin redeemable one-for-one with the dollar, an announcement that comes as his administration throws its support behind the digital tokens that underpin most crypto transactions.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）发出推迟新协议谈判的信号，塞内加尔欧洲债券下跌
item.description: 塞内加尔美元债券周二下跌，因为国际货币基金组织的一位官员称，由于该组织正在评估上届政府对政府债务规模的错误陈述，新贷款计划的谈判可能会被推迟。【原文：Senegal dollar bonds fell on Tuesday after an International Monetary Fund official said talks on a new lending program may be delayed as it assesses the previous administration’s misstatements about the size of the government’s debt.】

item.title: 嘉能可削减煤炭产量以阻止价格长期下滑
item.description: 全球最大的煤炭运输商嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）表示，将削减煤炭生产计划，以阻止煤炭价格的长期暴跌。【原文：Glencore Plc said it’s cutting planned coal production as the world’s biggest shipper of the dirtiest fuel looks to halt a prolonged collapse in prices.】

item.title: 美国称，俄罗斯和乌克兰认为不尽如人意的停火比持续战争更糟糕
item.description: 根据美国情报界的一项评估，俄罗斯和乌克兰可能更有动力延长三年的冲突，而不是匆忙达成解决方案，这与唐纳德-特朗普总统迅速结束三年冲突的承诺相冲突。【原文：Russia and Ukraine may see a greater incentive to prolong the three-year conflict instead of rushing into a settlement, according to an assessment by the US intelligence community that clashes with President Donald Trump’s pledges for a rapid end to the three-year conflict.】

item.title: 美国新房销售在天气原因导致的暴跌后略有上升
item.description: 由于住宅建筑商受益于较好的天气，同时依靠慷慨的销售奖励来刺激需求，美国上个月的新房销售从 2025 年的艰难开局中略有反弹。【原文：Sales of new homes in the US bounced back slightly last month from a rocky start to 2025 as homebuilders benefited from better weather while leaning on generous sales incentives to stoke demand.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数再次跌至2021年初以来最低点
item.description: 由于担心物价上涨和特朗普政府关税升级导致的经济前景恶化，3 月份美国消费者信心降至四年来的最低水平。【原文：US consumer confidence fell in March to the lowest level in four years on concerns about higher prices and the economic outlook amid the Trump administration’s escalating tariffs.】

item.title: 交易商应对关税风险，美铜创下历史新高
item.description: 由于交易商认为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普有可能对这种重要的工业金属征收巨额进口关税，纽约商品交易所（Comex）的期铜价格飙升至历史最高点。【原文：Copper futures on New York’s Comex exchange surged to an all-time high as traders price in the possibility that US President Donald Trump will impose hefty import tariffs on the crucial industrial metal.】

item.title: 和谈受阻，俄罗斯原油流量创五个月新高
item.description:

item.title: 欧盟收紧钢铁进口规则以保护钢铁行业
item.description: 欧盟采取措施限制免关税进口到该集团的钢材数量，以此作为保护该行业免受进口增长影响的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：The European Union took steps to limit the amount of steel that can be imported into the bloc tariff-free as part of a broader effort to protect the sector from rising imports.】

item.title: 英国北海石油监管机构上调投资和产量预期
item.description: 在 2024 年的数据高于预期之后，英国北海油气监管机构上调了对未来几年投资和产量的预测。【原文：The UK’s North Sea oil and gas regulator raised its forecasts for investment and production in the coming years after 2024 figures were higher than expected.】

item.title: 供应紧张推动 1 月份美国房价涨幅回升
item.description: 由于购房者争抢市场上紧俏的房源，美国 1 月份的房价增长略有加快。【原文：Home-price growth in the US accelerated slightly in January as buyers fought over a tight supply of listings on the market.】

item.title: 波利耶夫尔承诺取消加拿大部分房屋销售税
item.description: 保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利耶夫尔（Pierre Poilievre）提升了他在竞选中的重要承诺之一，即取消对加拿大新建住宅征收的联邦销售税，将其扩大到价值低于130万加元（91万美元）的新建住宅。【原文：Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre upgraded one of his key election promises to scrap the federal sales tax on new homes in Canada, expanding it to cover new residences worth less than C$1.3 million ($910,000).】

item.title: 匈牙利维持关键利率，重点关注瓦尔加的指导意见
item.description: 匈牙利在央行行长米哈里-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）领导下召开的首次政策会议上维持了利率不变，现在人们的注意力已转移到央行的货币政策指导上。【原文：Hungary held interest rates at the first policy meeting under Governor Mihaly Varga, with attention now shifting to the central bank’s monetary-policy guidance.】

item.title: 骗子将汽车贷款欺诈推向创纪录水平
item.description: 骗子们在社交媒体上互相交流骗术，正将汽车贷款欺诈推向创纪录的水平。【原文：Scammers who share tricks with one another on social media are pushing auto loan fraud to record levels.】

item.title: 上游交易让人窥见大宗商品交易的未来
item.description:
Vitol和Citadel最近斥资数十亿美元进行的收购反映出该行业正在推动拥有能源价值链的各个环节。【原文：

Vitol and Citadel’s recent billion-dollar purchases reflect the industry’s push to own chunks of the energy value chain.

】

item.title: 卡尼誓言为加拿大军队加薪并提供新装备
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，如果他赢得大选，他的政府将为武装部队加薪，加快购置军事装备，并授予加拿大海岸警卫队新的监视权。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney said his government would give raises to the armed forces, speed up the acquisition of military equipment and grant new surveillance powers to the Canadian Coast Guard if he wins the election.】

item.title: 特朗普首任墨西哥特使被确认出任国务院职务
item.description: 参议院已确认前美国驻墨西哥大使克里斯托弗-兰道（Christopher Landau）为副国务卿，这凸显了特朗普政府在外交政策议程中对美洲的重视。【原文：The Senate has confirmed Christopher Landau, a former US ambassador to Mexico, as deputy secretary of State, highlighting the Trump administration’s emphasis on the Americas in its foreign policy agenda.】

item.title: 美联储库格勒关注物价回升和通胀预期
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）表示支持在 "一段时间内 "保持利率稳定，同时强调美国人对通胀预期的某些指标有所上升。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler expressed support for holding interest rates steady for “some time,” while highlighting a move up in some measures of Americans’ inflation expectations.】

item.title: 削减开支带来经济风险，银行对英国货币持悲观态度
item.description: 在英国公布下一年度财政计划之前，大型银行对英镑的看法变得更加悲观，认为削减开支和经济增长预期疲软的风险削弱了英镑的吸引力。【原文：Big banks are turning more pessimistic on the pound before the UK unveils its fiscal plan for the coming year, saying the risk of spending cuts and weaker economic growth forecasts dampens the currency’s appeal.】

item.title: 美国针对中国海事舰队的收费引发争论
item.description: 周一，美国立法者、工会和钢铁制造商与航运公司和农场出口商就特朗普政府提出的对进入美国港口的与中国有联系的船只征收数百万美元税款的建议产生了分歧。【原文：US lawmakers, labor unions and steel manufacturers were at odds with shipping companies and farm exporters Monday over a Trump administration proposal to put million-dollar levies on China-linked ships upon entering a US port.】

item.title: 巴西央行称关键利率上调周期尚未结束
item.description: 根据巴西央行 3 月 18-19 日的政策会议记录，该行表示，在通胀前景不利的情况下，必须发出继续加息周期的信号。【原文：Brazil’s central bank said it was important to signal that its cycle of interest rate hikes will continue in the face of an adverse inflation outlook, according to the minutes to its March 18-19 policy meeting.】

item.title: 象牙海岸为债务回购和预算出售新欧洲债券
item.description: 象牙海岸正在推销撒哈拉以南非洲地区今年发行的第二笔新美元债券，因为这个世界头号可可生产国计划回购部分债务并提前偿还部分贷款。【原文：Ivory Coast is marketing Sub-Saharan Africa’s second new dollar-bond issue this year as the world’s top cocoa producer plans to buy back a portion of its debt and pay off some loans early.】

item.title: KKR 创始人助推其成为 "迷你伯克希尔 "的追求
item.description: KKR & Co.计划打破传统的收购模式，在自己的账簿上持有一些赌注数十年，该计划由一个紧密团结的团队指导，其中包括联合创始人亨利-克拉维斯（Henry Kravis）和乔治-罗伯茨（George Roberts）。【原文：KKR & Co.’s plan to break from the traditional buyout model and hold some bets on its own books for decades is being directed by a tight-knit group, including co-founders Henry Kravis and George Roberts.】

item.title: 农夫山泉增长速度为 2020 年上市以来最慢，公关压力依然存在
item.description: 农夫山泉股份有限公司自 2020 年上市以来，年度利润增长最为缓慢，因为去年该公司的包装饮用水产品受到负面报道的影响。【原文：Nongfu Spring Co. reported the slowest annual profit growth since its 2020 listing after its packaged drinking water products were the subject of negative publicity last year.】

item.title: 贡渥集团在原油交易亏损后调整领导层
item.description: 贡渥集团首席执行官托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjörn Törnqvist）表示，去年贡渥集团在原油交易中遭受了一些打击，包括看涨北海的交易策略出了问题，因此正在更新其领导团队。【原文：Gunvor Group is renewing its leadership team after taking some hits in crude oil trading last year, including a bullish North Sea trading play that went wrong, according to Chief Executive Officer Torbjörn Törnqvist.】
